alert.note: Alert for Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 13 at 5:12PM EST until December 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Martin. * WHEN...Until 815 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 512 PM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jupiter Island, Hobe Sound, Hobe Sound Beach and Hobe Sound Wildlife Refuge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
